snippet: The government said Thursday that it was sending 1,000 police officers to an Amazon basin city where three people were killed during rioting by illegal gold miners.
abstract: Government of Peru sends 1,000 police officers to an Amazon basin city where three people were killed during rioting by illegal gold miners.
lead_paragraph: The government said Thursday that it was sending 1,000 police officers to an Amazon basin city where three people were killed during rioting by illegal gold miners.

headline.main: Peru: More Police to Go to Mine Region
headline.print_headline: Peru: More Police to Go to Mine Region
